headline: Is Norwegian Cruise Line (NCLH) Pricing Reflect Recovery After Recent Cruise Demand Headlines
summary: If you are wondering whether Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings is good value at around US$23.09, the key question is how its current share price lines up with what the business might reasonably be worth. The stock has had mixed returns, with a 6.7% gain over the last 30 days and a 48.7% return over 3 years, set against a 1.4% gain year to date and an 11.3% decline over the past year. Recent headlines around cruise demand, pricing, and balance sheet resilience have kept Norwegian Cruise Line...
